author: SegmentLinking
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds makes small updates to notebooks which are used for neural network training in LST. The goal is reproducibility. The updates are:

1. Set seeds at the beginning
1. Set seed in the pair-making threads
1. Don't use `as_completed`, which has non-deterministic order of the threads

#### PR validation:

I ran the notebooks a handful of times, and the results don't change after the updates. Chatgpt and gemini also approve of the approach.

cc @GNiendorf @slava77
title: LST notebooks for neural network training: make training reproducible
